Name: Brightwood "Concord" Bed
Desc: A mattress woven from hay and many kinds of leaves is placed on top of a sturdy Brightwood bed frame. Add some soft bedding, and you get this practical bed. The bed is neither exceedingly large nor tall, and can also double as a chair. Therefore, no matter how cramped the room is, this bed can make people feel calm and collected, and help them have a good rest.
Source: Purchased from Battle Pass: Gnostic Chorus
